mapper.insert: insert into TB_CAB002D (BOARD_ID, POST_ID, TITLE, CN, PASSWD, TASK_SE_CD, CATGR_ID_GRP, CATLG_ID, IMG_FILE_GRP_ID, ATTCH_FILE_GRP_ID, HIDDN_YN, REPLY_YN, DEL_YN, USE_YN, REGIST_USR_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDT_USR_ID, UPDT_DT ) values (#{boardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{cn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, '1', #{taskSeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{catgrIdGrp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{catlgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attchFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hiddnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{replyYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'N', 'Y', #{registUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate(), #{updtUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getdate() )
mapper.update: update TB_CAB002D set TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CN = #{cn,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, PASSWD = '1', TASK_SE_CD = #{taskSeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATGR_ID_GRP = #{catgrIdGrp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, CATLG_ID = #{catlgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG_FILE_GRP_ID = #{imgFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTCH_FILE_GRP_ID = #{attchFileGrpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HIDDN_YN = #{hiddnYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPLY_YN = #{replyYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_YN = 'N', USE_YN = 'Y', UPDT_USR_ID = #{updtUsrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDT_DT = getdate() where BOARD_ID = #{boardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and POST_ID = #{postId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select BOARD_ID, POST_ID, TITLE, CN, PASSWD, TASK_SE_CD, CATGR_ID_GRP, CATLG_ID, IMG_FILE_GRP_ID, ATTCH_FILE_GRP_ID, HIDDN_YN, REPLY_YN, DEL_YN, USE_YN, REGIST_USR_ID, REGIST_DT, UPDT_USR_ID, UPDT_DT from TB_CAB002D
